reviews.review: Great movie! Definitely a must see!
This is everything a marvel movie should be
Saw the movie on Sunday.  It wasn't as good as I had hoped.  In fact i dosed off for a minute.  The ending seemed to drag on forever.  Not a big fan of this one.

The Russo brothers at it again! Thanos's might was real and not implied just the way the comic depicts. Excellent job in not falling prey to the soft desires of movie watchers today who want every script to have a fairy tale ending. Sometimes the bad guy wins as is the case in life. 10 years of waiting and worth its weight in gold. A must see best Avengers. The bar is now beyond the mark. Another level of Marvel excellence will be indeed infinity!
very good...but didnt exploit most of the characters powers for fight scenes...the hulk being scared...you could have left him out.

This movie gets right into action, grips your attention and doesn't let go. The character interactions are incredible. This movie will make you laugh your butt off and then make you cry a few moments later.
Damn near perfect, only minor nit picks about some CGI bits and lack character for the Black Order
truly amazing but heart breaking aswell
Spoiler good but lazy writing at ending. just bring them all back with the time stone or some other easily made up way..kinda lame man

Movie is good. Still felt could have been better. 
Although the ensemble can never get enough screen time. 
I felt disappointed when Cap didn't get enough action and dialogues. Felt that he was just participating. 
Thor's Hammer shouldn't be held by wood. Should have had vibranium Stick. Although every moment of the movie was just amazing and have to give credit to makers to have audience left behind in shock.. 
Thanos was fabulous and felt he just was mad man with a genuine reason to gain the infinity Gems. 
The wait for next movie seems wrong... Just wrong.. and long.. Russo's could have worked on that. I hope Marvel doesnt let Kevin move out as he is a visionary. I think he should move out and start working with DC Comics. I am even waiting for the vast ensemble of Disney and Fox characters to come together. I have even heard Wolverine is in Avengers 4. I hope its true.
